text:
The model returned as the face of the high-end shoe brand for their Fall/Winter 2017 in a series of stark, minimalist black and white images shot by the legendary photographer and personal friend of Gigi, Mario Testino . In the first image, the Vogue cover star wears a black trench coat slung around her shoulders paired with the brand’s over-the-knee white, heeled Tiemodel boot and in the second wears a white button-down with the It-Girl-approved Cling ankle boot .

But there’s something else striking about these images aside from the footwear–Gigi’s brand new beauty look! For the campaign, Weitzman decided to switch things up, putting their favorite model in a pixie cut wig by Shay Ashual. The faux style was meant to evoke Jean Seberg’s character in the iconic French New Wave film Breathless, giving the images a 1960s feel as well as “a chic and modern twist on her fourth consecutive Stuart Weitzman campaign.” Now the only question is, will this photo shoot convince Gigi to finally take the plunge and make the cut for real? It could really help her and Zayn take their couple twinning to all new heights.
title: Gigi Hadid Has a Pixie Cut in Stuart Weitzman Campaign

meta_data.description: Gigi Hadid ditched her usual long, wavy locks, debuting a new pixie cut in the latest Stuart Weitzman campaign
